T02D3598:224b-1: badzra shrim kham l'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3598:224b-3: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3598:224b-4: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3598:224b-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
T02D3598:224b-6: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D3598:224b-7: h'um yig ljang gu las skyes pa'i sku mdog ljang
T02D3598:224b-8: gu zhal gsum pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02D3598:224b-9: zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa /
T02D3598:224b-10: g-yas ser skya la spyan ser skya dang ldan pa /
T02D3598:224b-11: g-yon pa dmar zhing khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D3598:224b-12: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D3598:224b-14: rdo rje lcags sgrog dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02D3598:224b-15: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang /
T02D3598:224b-19: rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D3598:224b-20: byi la'i pags pas stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02D3598:224b-21: don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3598:224b-22: dbu skra ser skya gyen du 'khyil par bsams la /
T02D3598:224b-23: aom badzra shrim kha le h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3598:224b-24: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
